name: Battlefield 3: Armored Kill
description:
Battlefield 3: Armored Kill is an action-shooter game developed by Electronic Arts DICE. It was originally released in 2012. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Battlefield 3: Armored Kill is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
Johan Skugge and Jukka Rintamäki scored the game.
